long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weather-Guides.com does exactly what it says – your friendly guide to the weather – if you want to know if its raining cats and dogs in Seattle, perfect for a BBQ in Melbourne or if you need to bring an umbrella to your meeting in Manchester then look no further...

Download the Weather-Guides.com extension and not only will you be able to plan your weekend based on the weather forecast for your area and anywhere else you want to see but we can also help you to quickly find and view search results directly from a new tab.

By allowing the Weather-Guides.com extension to replace your browsers new tab you can see if you should be packing your shorts for that weekend away and making that reservation Al Fresco for your favourite restaurant all in the same browser window.  The new tab will provide you with direct access to the Bing search engine.

EULA - https://www.weather-guides.com/eula
Contact Us - https://www.weather-guides.com/contact-us
